Funds raised through this event will be used to purchase items for donation, including high-quality thermal blankets which can provide waterproof warmth from the elements. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/blog/we-donated-100-care-packages-to-toronto-shelters/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Earlier this year, we raised over $2000 through a single donation drive like this one, and we were able to donate 100 care packages to local homeless shelters","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". With this donation fundraiser now, we hope to surpass this goal and donate more essential items to the homeless community! ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"This month’s fundraiser comes with an exciting twist! As we cross milestones towards our funding goal of $3000, the Blankets for T.O. executive team will be completing \"dares\". These are fun, exciting and harmless challenges that mark our initiative’s progress. Ever wondered what would happen if you said happy birthday to a random stranger on campus? Do you want to see one of our executives get hit with whipped cream to the face? Those two dares are just a hint of what you might see over on our Instagram account (","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/blanketsforto/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"@blanketsforto","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"). Follow us to keep updated on our fundraiser and see our executive team tackle some of these bizarre dares.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

childMarkdownRemark.html: This December, Blankets for T.O. is organizing another fundraiser for the donation of items to homeless shelters. Our goal is $3000.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: This December, Blankets for T.O. is organizing another fundraiser for the donation of items to homeless shelters. Our goal is $3000.
